fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.instructions: Brief description of you as a specialist.

fields.label: Description of project
fields.name: description_of_project
fields.instructions: Note: To separate paragraphs, insert a blank line.

fields.label: Responsibilities
fields.name: responsibilities
fields.instructions: Description of the works performed by specialist. Note: To separate paragraphs, insert a blank line.

fields.label: Studio or company
fields.name: studio_or_company
fields.instructions: The studio or company in which specialist performed this project. You can specify freelance.

fields.label: Text
fields.name: text
fields.instructions: Any text (e.g., tagline, quote, call to action). This text will appear in the footer.

fields.label: Photo
fields.name: photo-welcome
fields.instructions: Upload your photo with transparent background. The image format must be 1x1.06.

sub_fields.label: About place of work
sub_fields.name: about_place_of_work
sub_fields.instructions: Description of the place of work (studio, company, etc.).

sub_fields.label: Specialty
sub_fields.name: specialty-education
sub_fields.instructions: You can specify the name of the training course.

sub_fields.label: Educational institution
sub_fields.name: educational_institution
sub_fields.instructions: You can specify the name of the studio or company where the internship took place.

sub_fields.label: Achievments
sub_fields.name: achievments
sub_fields.instructions: Note: To separate paragraphs, insert a blank line.

sub_fields.label: File of diploma
sub_fields.name: file_of_diploma
sub_fields.instructions: File must only be in PDF, PNG or JPG format.

sub_fields.label: File of certificate
sub_fields.name: file_of_certificate
sub_fields.instructions: File must only be in PDF, PNG or JPG format.
